about_the_game:
Summon hordes of minions to defend your realm against growing waves of invading heroes. Unlock permanent upgrades, new levels and more advanced minions to survive the ever-growing threat.

Fast-paced gameplay

Rapidly deploy your minions against the approaching heroes, collect treasure from slain enemies, and grow your might to match the growing waves of the vampire slayers.

Varied levels

The battles take place in various regions of your domain, such as the barren desert, the dark forest, the cold mountains, the fiery volcano, and many more. Each region has their own unique heroes, as well as unique minions. Progress through these areas as the invasion grows stronger, and try to find the perfect unit synergies to destroy your enemies.

Unlock powers

Grow stronger between battles by spending the blood of your enemies, to unlock and upgrade a multitude of abilities. You can also recruit regional minions to help you in other regions, to make more refined strategies and synergies as you progress.
